title: Number of Messages Counter
content:
I used to be able to see the number/count of new messages and old messages in all of my message folders. There seems to have been an update, and all of my numbers are missing. Can you tell me how to fix this please.

Regards, Jan Knight
creator: jan231

title: Opening emails in Local Folders on my C drive using Explorer in Windows 11
content: How do I open emails in Local Folders using Explorer in Windows 11? I know they should be in C:\users\[user]\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles. Btw, the AppData folder only showed after I told Explorer to show Hidden files; any help should note this. I found that folder with 2 subfolders; 1 was iup3xrv2.default-release which seemed to have the only relevant content - Mail\2023 and \2023.msf. Those appear to be the Local Folder (2023) I set up to receive my archived emails. But when I tried to open them, an email opened with an attachment that Thunderbird could not open. I would like to be able to access the archived emails through Explorer so I can mass delete, search, rename, see file size etc. Please explain and help. Thanks.
creator: davidob1996

title: Problem with attachments after updating Thunderbird from version 102.15.1 to version 115.4.2
content:
Hello, After updating the Thunderbird email program from version 102.15.1 to version 115.4.2, each new email received with a (checked) .pdf, .docx downloaded to disk 0 Bytes and displaying an empty document. Create it directly in Thunderbird, it's also impossible. In the case of this message to another sender who has Thunderbird 102.15.1, it opens without any problems, forward it to the recipient who has access to the 115.4.2 version, it already opens ten files and saves it to disk in a size that has ten files. Strange thing, it works, but it can't be like that. Please let me know what could be the solution to the problem.

Regards
creator: tzajdel1

title: Jak vrátit vzhled TB před poslední aktualizací?
content: Po aktualizaci na verzi 115.4.1 se po létech změnilo rozložení ovládání TB k horšímu. Pole rychlého filtru se přesunulo na horší místo, tlačítka rychlých filtrů apod. změnila vzhled. Namísto původního přehledného vybarvení tlačítka se na každém objevila jakási "svítící diodka" tak malá a nevýrazná, že její použití není na první pohled patrné. Celkově je nový skin plošší jak je dnes hloupým zvykem, ale to dovedu přežít. Jak vrátit původní rozložení a vzhled tlačítek rychlých filtrů? Hodně je používám.
creator: Ja.Claudius

title: collegamento thunderbird alla nuova casella istruzione.it ora con outlook.365 e non più con Aruba
content:
Buongiorno, sono un dipendente della scuola, il ministero per l’ennesima volta ha cambiato server e dopo Aruba questa volta si è connesso a Microsoft variando la casella di posta e tutti i parametri. Vorrei aprire la mia casella da Thunderbird e quindi ho creato il nuovo account da casella email esistente indicando i parametri richiesti (la maggior parte li aveva corretti, in automatico), tentando sia con la modalità imap che con il pop3. Sembrava fosse tutto ok, solo che quando vado a scaricare la posta, Thunderbird mi dice: il server outlook.office.365.com si è disconnesso. Il server potrebbe non essere disponibile o potrebbe esserci stato un problema di rete. La connessione è ottima, andando invece, direttamente su outlook.365 entro e vedo la posta senza problemi, sembra che tutto dipenda solo da Thunderbird, cosa posso fare  ? Grazie

P.S. il problema descritto riguarda solo la modalità imap, con il pop3 non mi fa accedere perchè dice che o è errato il nome utente o la password ma, ovviamente sono corretti, tanto che con gli stessi da web entro e vedo tutto

title: Occasional detach failure
content: I have Thunderbird 115.4.1 (64 bit) installed on a Windows 7 Home Premium SP1 machine. I have tried to get into the habit of Detaching attachments rather than just Saving them As. From time to time, I'd estimate approximately 5-10% of the times I detach multiple attachments, one of them does not detach successfully, and leaves an empty file of the correct name in the specified target destination. When this happens, I am able to go back to the email and re-detach it successfully. I don't think I've ever had the issue when I've tried to detach a single attachment. I tried searching for "detach" and found 33 items but none of them talk about this issue.
creator: spargeus.maximus
